img_text: United Xtra @utdxtra UTD XTRA In an era where Coutinho is going for £142m, Neymar for £220m, Mbappe £166m, swapping Mkhitaryan who was failing to make our benclh for a world class player in Alexis Sanchez has to be one of the greatest ever deals in football. What a signing. #mufc acidas EVROLET
